summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Neuronova cinematic one-page website. All backend APIs (8/8) and frontend features working perfectly. Contact form integration, services display, navigation, and mobile responsiveness all functioning correctly.
passed_tests: Backend API health check (GET /api/health)
Backend root endpoint (GET /api/)
Services endpoint returning 6 categories correctly
Testimonials endpoint with proper structure
Contact form submission with success response
Quote form submission working
Form validation for invalid inputs
Hero section with NEURONOVA title and parallax
Navigation with all 6 section links (Accueil, Services, Histoire, Mission, Fondateurs, Contact)
Services section with 6 category tabs switching content
60+ services displayed across categories with hover effects
Histoire section with founding story (2025, Kinshasa)
Mission and Vision cards display
6 Values cards displayed correctly
Founders section with David Ntumba and Jordan Leko photos
Contact form UI integration with backend API
WhatsApp floating button visible and functional
Smooth scroll navigation between sections
Stats display (60+ services, 50+ clients, 100+ projets, 2025)
Mobile responsive layout with working mobile menu
Footer with contact information and back-to-top button
